docs.text: Bienvenu to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Bienvenu to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.text: Welcome to FRENCH HCL Volt MX documentation Overview FRENCH This site provides documentation, training, and other notes for the Jekyll Documentation theme. There's a lot of information about how to do a variety of things here, and it's not all unique to this theme. But by and large, understanding how to do things in Jekyll depends on how your theme is coded. As a result, these additional details are provided. From topic2 MD File The instructions here are geared towards technical writers working on documentation. You may have a team of one or more technical writers working on documentation for multiple projects. You can use this same theme to author all of your documentation for each of your products. The theme is built to accommodate documentation for multiple products on the same site. To log into HCL Volt MX Foundry Engagement Services, follow these steps: On your Linux computer, pass this shell command. Open an Internet browser. Enter the Volt MX Foundry Engagement Services URL in the Address field in the browser, Volt MX Foundry Engagement Services console URL is http:// : /vpns Example: http://localhost:8080/vpns Press the Enter key. The Volt MX Foundry Engagement Services Login screen appears. Enter the user name in the Username field. Enter the password in the Password field. Click the Sign in button. The Dashboard page appears as the landing page in the console. docs.text: Overview Product Overview FRENCH From topic2 MD File The instructions here are geared towards technical writers working on documentation. You may have a team of one or more technical writers working on documentation for multiple projects. You can use this same theme to author all of your documentation for each of your products. The theme is built to accommodate documentation for multiple products on the same site. Survey of features Some of the more prominent features of this theme include the following: Bootstrap framework Navgoco multi-level sidebar for table of contents Ability to specify different sidebars for different products Top navigation bar with drop-down menus Notes, tips, and warning information notes Tags for alternative navigation Advanced landing page layouts from the Modern Business theme . Getting started To get started, see [Getting Started][index].
docs.title: Overview
